```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressMessages(library(data.table))

genes <- fread('dopamine_genes.tsv',header=T)

genes_comp <- genes %>% 
  select(gnomAD3g,Location,Allele,PL_AF,gnomADg_AF_NFE,SYMBOL,IMPACT, ClinVar_CLNSIG ) %>%
  filter(IMPACT == 'HIGH' | IMPACT == 'MODERATE') %>% 
  distinct()

genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE <- ifelse(genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE == '-',0,genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE)
genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE <- as.numeric(genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE)

genes_comp$nfe_diff <- genes_comp$PL_AF - genes_comp$gnomADg_AF_NFE

kable(genes_comp %>% arrange(IMPACT) %>% filter(gnomAD3g == 'rs587776842') %>%
        mutate(PL_AF = round(PL_AF,3),
               gnomADg_AF_NFE = round(gnomADg_AF_NFE,3),
               nfe_diff = round(nfe_diff,4))
        )
```
